mayi# gRuhNAqmyagrE# aqgni(gm) rAqyaspOShA#ya suprajAqstvAya# suqvIryA#ya | 
mayi# praqjAM mayiq varcO# dadhAqmyari#ShTAH syAma taqnuvA# suqvIrA$H ||
yO nO# aqgniH pi#tarO hRuqthsva#ntarama#rtyOq martyA(gm)# AviqvESa# | 
tamAqtman pari# gRuhNImahE vaqyaM mA sO aqsmA(gm) a#vaqhAyaq parA# gAt || 
yada#ddhvaqryurAqtmannaqgnima-gRu#hItvAq&gniM ci#nuqyAdyO$&syaq 
svO$&gnistamapiq - [  ] 36
